title: Why do straight women wear men's underwear? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’m not a straight woman but I can still answer. I think many people including me would rather wear cheap and comfortable men's briefs and boxers than have a piece of thin fabric to dig out of our a** every 20 mins. Men’s underwear tends to be very comfortable and versatile for camping and athletic activities.

Probably for the same reason many men, including myself wear women’s underwear. They find it more comfortable to wear for whatever reason, or they enjoy wearing it. Not a big deal at all, wear what you want!
